text: Kapodistrias may refer to: * Ioannis Kapodistrias, Greek diplomat and Foreign Minister of the Russian Empire and later the first head of state of independent Greece * Augustinos Kapodistrias, Greek soldier and politician * Capodistria, the Italian name of the city of Koper, Slovenia * the 1997 Kapodistrias reform of local government in Greece * Kapodistrias Museum located in Corfu
title: Kapodistrias
